message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $160. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $160 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140 to see if we can find common ground. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $140, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $130
Bob,  $130 is still a little too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $135? It's a fair price for both of us.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $128
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $128 is still below my minimum.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'm offering $132.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to pay a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but that's as high as I can go
